name: clipboard-to-markdown
title: Markdown Converter
description: Convert clipboard between Markdown and rich text. Works with Google Docs, Sheets, Word, Notion, HTML, and websites. Bidirectional: HTML→Markdown and Markdown→Rich Text.
author: alex

commands.name: convert-to-markdown
commands.title: Clipboard → Markdown
commands.description: Convert HTML and rich text to Markdown. Works with Google Docs, Sheets, Word, Notion, websites.

commands.name: convert-to-plain-markdown
commands.title: Clipboard → Markdown (Text Only)
commands.description: Convert to Markdown without images. Perfect for documentation and plain text workflows.

commands.name: convert-markdown-to-richtext
commands.title: Markdown → Rich Text
commands.description: Convert Markdown to formatted rich text for pasting into Google Docs, Word, email, Slack.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
